mapper.select:
select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoil
from res_notoil_vip
stationID IN
#{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select notOil.minutes as name,notOil.notOilMoney/oil.oilLitre as value from (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney
from res_notoil_vip
from res_notoil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) notOil left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(oilLitre)/1000 oilLitre
from res_oil_vip
from res_oil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes <DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) oil on notOil.minutes=oil.minutes order by notOil.minutes asc

select notOil.minutes as name,notOil.notOilMoney/oil.oilLitre as value,notOil.stationID stationID from (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney
from res_notoil_vip
from res_notoil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) notOil left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(oilLitre)/1000 oilLitre
from res_oil_vip
from res_oil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes <DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) oil on notOil.minutes=oil.minutes and notOil.stationID=oil.stationID order by notOil.stationID,notOil.minutes asc

select notOil.minutes,notOil.notOilNumber,notOil.avgMoney,notOil.notOilMoney, vipNotOil.notOilNumber vipNotOilNumber,vipNotOil.notOilMoney vipNotOilMoney,vipNotOil.avgMoney vipavgMoney,
notOil.notOilNumber-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilNumber,0) notVipNotOilNumber, (notOil.notOilMoney-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilMoney,0))/(notOil.notOilNumber-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilNumber,0)) notVipAvgMoney, (notOil.notOilMoney-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilMoney,0)) notVipNotOilMoney from(select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) notOil left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney from res_notoil_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes <DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) vipNotOil on notOil.minutes=vipNotOil.minutes order by notOil.minutes asc

select notOil.minutes,notOil.stationID stationID,notOil.notOilNumber,notOil.avgMoney,notOil.notOilMoney, vipNotOil.notOilNumber vipNotOilNumber,vipNotOil.notOilMoney vipNotOilMoney,vipNotOil.avgMoney vipavgMoney, notOil.notOilNumber-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilNumber,0) notVipNotOilNumber, (notOil.notOilMoney-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilMoney,0))/(notOil.notOilNumber-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilNumber,0)) notVipAvgMoney, (notOil.notOilMoney-IFNULL(vipNotOil.notOilMoney,0)) notVipNotOilMoney from(select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) notOil left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney from res_notoil_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes <DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) vipNotOil on notOil.minutes=vipNotOil.minutes AND notOil.stationID=vipNotOil.stationID order by notOil.stationID,notOil.minutes asc

select except.minutes,except.value money,vipExcept.value vipMoney,(except.itemValue-IFNULL(vipExcept.itemValue,0))/(except.dealNum-IFNULL(vipExcept.dealNum,0)) notVipMoney from (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value,sum(itemValue) itemValue,sum(dealNum) dealNum from res_exceptLube
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) except left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value,sum(itemValue) itemValue,sum(dealNum) dealNum from res_exceptLube_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) vipExcept on except.minutes=vipExcept.minutes order by except.minutes asc

select except.minutes,except.stationID,except.value money,vipExcept.value vipMoney,(except.itemValue-IFNULL(vipExcept.itemValue,0))/(except.dealNum-IFNULL(vipExcept.dealNum,0)) notVipMoney from (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value,sum(itemValue) itemValue,sum(dealNum) dealNum from res_exceptLube
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) except left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,stationID, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value,sum(itemValue) itemValue,sum(dealNum) dealNum from res_exceptLube_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,2) vipExcept on except.minutes=vipExcept.minutes AND except.stationID=vipExcept.stationID order by except.stationID,except.minutes asc

select DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,sum(instoreMoney) instoreMoney,sum(fastfoodMoney) fastfoodMoney,sum(perishableMoney) perishableMoney,sum(lubeMoney) lubeMoney, sum(cigaretteMoney) cigaretteMoney,sum(dailyMoney) dailyMoney,sum(teamcardMoney) teamcardMoney,sum(alcoholicMoney) alcoholicMoney, sum(snackMoney) snackMoney,sum(nonalcoholicMoney) nonalcoholicMoney,sum(nonfoodMoney) nonfoodMoney
from res_notoilDepartmentb
from res_notoilDepartmentb_vip
station_id IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,station_id stationID,sum(instoreMoney) instoreMoney,sum(fastfoodMoney) fastfoodMoney,sum(perishableMoney) perishableMoney,sum(lubeMoney) lubeMoney, sum(cigaretteMoney) cigaretteMoney,sum(dailyMoney) dailyMoney,sum(teamcardMoney) teamcardMoney,sum(alcoholicMoney) alcoholicMoney, sum(snackMoney) snackMoney,sum(nonalcoholicMoney) nonalcoholicMoney,sum(nonfoodMoney) nonfoodMoney
from res_notoilDepartmentb
from res_notoilDepartmentb_vip
station_id IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 2,1

select
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber)/sum(allNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoilRate
from res_notoilRate_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
hours >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and hours < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H')
group by 1

select
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber)/sum(allNumber) avgMoney ,stationID
from res_notoilRate
from res_notoilRate_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
hours >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and hours < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H')
group by 3,1

select top10 name,sum(money) value
from res_notoilTop
from res_notoilTop_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by productCode order by sum(money) desc limit 10

select top10 name,sum(money) value,stationID
from res_notoilTop
from res_notoilTop_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by productCode,stationID order by sum(money) desc limit 10

select sum(departmentMoney) notOilMoney,sum(departmentNumber) notOilNumber,sum(departmentMoney)/sum(departmentNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoilDepartment
from res_notoilDepartment_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
departmentName=#{departmentName} and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')

select sum(departmentMoney) notOilMoney,sum(departmentNumber) notOilNumber,sum(departmentMoney)/sum(departmentNumber) avgMoney,stationID
from res_notoilDepartment
from res_notoilDepartment_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
departmentName=#{departmentName} and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
GROUP BY stationID

select sum(notoilNumber)/sum(allNumber)
from res_notoilRate ran left join station on ran.stationID=station.id left join tag_station st
on station.id=st.stationId left join tag on st.tagId=tag.id left join category on
station.categoryId=category.id
where
ran.stationID=#{station} and
category.id=#{station} and
tag_station.tagId=#{station} and
ran.hours >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and ran.hours < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H')

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') as name,sum(sellMoney) value
from res_notoilSearch
station_id IN #{item}
and
product_code=#{productCode} and
days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') as name,sum(sellMoney) value,station_id stationID
from res_notoilSearch
station_id IN #{item}
and
product_code=#{productCode} and
days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1,3 order by 1 asc
